org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class GFF3SeqHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.GFF3SeqHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NcbiGffGFF3SeqHandler

    public class GFF3SeqHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    An interface used by GFF3Converter to choose the type of sequence Items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GFF3SeqHandler

        public GFF3SeqHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • makeSequenceItem

        public Item makeSequenceItem(GFF3Converter converter,
                    java.lang.String identifier)
        For the given GFF3Converter and sequence identifier, make a new sequence object. By default this method calls GFF3Converter.getSeqClsName() to get the class name of the Item to return. Override to choose the class name based on the identifier.
        Parameters:
        converter - the current GFF3Converter
        identifier - the identifier of the sequence from the GFF file
        Returns:
        a new sequence Item

      • getSeqIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getSeqIdentifier(java.lang.String id)
        Return the identifier of this sequence, default implementation returns the id passed to it. Subclasses can override to update identifiers to be used, e.g. if using an IdResolver. This method is used by GFF3Converter to make sequence items unique.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to lookup
        Returns:
        the identifier to use

      • createItem

        protected Item createItem(GFF3Converter converter)
        Create the sequence item from the converter.
        Parameters:
        converter - that we are handling the sequence for
        Returns:
        the new sequence item
